title: Readout of Salvadoran-American White House Briefing | The White House
content: This week, the White House Office of Public Engagement convened over 100 Latino leaders from the Salvadoran community to discuss the Biden-Harris Administration’s ongoing efforts and investments within the Latino community.During the briefing, participants discussed the United States-El Salvador relation, including economic accomplishments of the Administration pertaining to President Biden’s Investing in America Agenda, the Justice40 Initiative, and affordable housing investments.Speakers uplifted the historic investments secured by the Biden-Harris Administration through private partnerships to address the root causes of migration in Central America and praised the economic investments to the Latino community as part of President Biden’s economic agenda Bidenomics, and shared their successful stories on how their communities have benefited from it.Biden-Harris Administration officials will continue working with the community to deliver on the President’s efforts to advance equity for the Latino community.Administration Participants Included:###
